inclusion.criterion: Been hospitalized for a pathological pregnancy condition
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Having been transferred from other hospitals
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Been under stressful family events (deaths, recent separation: self-reported)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: With a diagnosis of a mental psychiatric diseases
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: With a diagnosis of cancer pathology
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 25-year-old pregnant woman with fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, dysuria, urgency, frequency and flank pain. Gram-negative rod-shaped bacterial cells in urine culture.
